name: RE: SaP
description:
Made in GB Studio.
You look and move around the default Sample Project that comes with GB Studio for 10 seconds outdoor.
...
Well after 10 seconds, the game will be shaped into something out of the sample world to a strange ride to re-shape it back to the not so strange Sample Project.
But its up to you, whether you want to enjoy the changed Game or the original default sample project.

Enjoy your time in RE: SaP

Created in Global Game Jam 2020.
